meanings.sent1: The book club only discusses mentionable authors.
meanings.sent2: It is important to make sure all key points are mentionable in the report.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was mentionable enough to interrupt the meeting with its meows.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so bright and contagious, it was mentionable from across the room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made the lesson so engaging that every student found it mentionable.
